name: n8n Form
semantic_context: Generate webforms in n8n and pass their responses to the workflow
natural_language_description: 这是 n8n Form 节点。主要用于: Generate webforms in n8n and pass their responses to the workflow

triggerNotice.displayName: An n8n Form Trigger node must be set up before this node
triggerNotice.name: triggerNotice
triggerNotice.natural_language_description: 参数名: An n8n Form Trigger node must be set up before this node

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Page Type | 默认值: page

defineForm.name: defineForm
defineForm.natural_language_description: 参数名: Define Form | 默认值: fields

jsonOutput.name: jsonOutput

formFields.name: formFields
formFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Form Elements | 默认值: {}

limitWaitTime.name: limitWaitTime
limitWaitTime.description: Whether to limit the time this node should wait for a user response before execution resumes
limitWaitTime.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit Wait Time | 作用: Whether to limit the time this node should wait for a user response before execution resumes | 默认值: False

limitType.name: limitType
limitType.description: Sets the condition for the execution to resume. Can be a specified date or after some time.
limitType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit Type | 作用: Sets the condition for the execution to resume. Can be a specified date or after some time. | 默认值: afterTimeInterval
available_options: After Time Interval (值: afterTimeInterval) - Waits for a certain amount of time
At Specified Time (值: atSpecifiedTime) - Waits until the set date and time to continue

resumeAmount.name: resumeAmount
resumeAmount.natural_language_description: 参数名: Amount | 作用: The time to wait | 默认值: 1

resumeUnit.name: resumeUnit
resumeUnit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Unit | 作用: Unit of the interval value | 默认值: hours

maxDateAndTime.name: maxDateAndTime
maxDateAndTime.description: Continue execution after the specified date and time
maxDateAndTime.natural_language_description: 参数名: Max Date and Time | 作用: Continue execution after the specified date and time

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: formTitle (值: None) - Shown at the top of the form
customCss (值: None) - Override default styling of the public form interface with CSS

respondWith.name: respondWith
respondWith.natural_language_description: 参数名: On n8n Form Submission | 默认值: text
available_options: Show Completion Screen (值: text) - Show a response text to the user
Redirect to URL (值: redirect) - Redirect the user to a URL
Show Text (值: showText) - Display simple text or HTML
Return Binary File (值: returnBinary) - Return incoming binary file

completionTitle.name: completionTitle
completionTitle.natural_language_description: 参数名: Completion Title | (必填项)

responseText.name: responseText
responseText.description: The text to display on the page. Use HTML to show a customized web page.
responseText.natural_language_description: 参数名: Text | 作用: The text to display on the page. Use HTML to show a customized web page.

inputDataFieldName.name: inputDataFieldName
inputDataFieldName.description: Find the name of input field containing the binary data to return in the Input panel on the left, in the Binary tab
inputDataFieldName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Input Data Field Name | 作用: Find the name of input field containing the binary data to return in the Input panel on the left, in the Binary tab | 提示: The name of the input field containing the binary file data to be returned | 默认值: data
